sentences.en: A subsequent ratification has a retrospective affect, and be equivalent to a prior command.
sentences.cn: 事后假追认有溯及力, 等同先前命令.

sentences.en: Despite its judicial ratification, all was not well with the Fairness Doctrine.
sentences.cn: 公平原则尽管获得了司法上的认可, 但并不意味着万事大吉.

sentences.en: Instruments of ratification and accession shall be deposited with the Director General.
sentences.cn: 批准书和加入书应递交总干事保存.

sentences.en: Opinion polls indicated a two - thirds majority in favour of ratification of the treaty.
sentences.cn: 民意调查表明2/3的多数票赞成批准这个条约.

sentences.en: Price quoted with no certificate or instrument of ratification is included.
sentences.cn: 所有报价不包括证书及批文.

sentences.en: Ratification of the choice of the Auditor for the coming period.
sentences.cn: 批准下一周期的审计人选.

sentences.en: The agreement have to go the board for ratification.
sentences.cn: 这个协定必须经董事会的正式批准.

sentences.en: The present Convention is subject to ratification.
The ratification of the conventions of nine States establishment of this Constitution.
sentences.cn: 本宪法经过九个州的大会批准后,即开始生效.

sentences.en: The Ratification of the EU Draft Constitution : A Unification of Diversities?
sentences.cn: 欧盟宪法草案的通过——多样性的统一?

sentences.en: The senate recommended ratification of the treaty despite the public opion.
sentences.cn: 国会不顾公众的意见,建议修改条约.

sentences.en: The term ratification means ratification, acceptance or approval.
sentences.cn: “认可”是指认可 、 接受或同意.

sentences.en: The treaty is subject to ratification.
sentences.cn: 此条约经批准后才能生效.

sentences.en: This agreement is subject to ratification by the authorities of both parties.
sentences.cn: 此协议需经双方负责人士批准.

sentences.en: We welcome this development and we look forward to early ratification of the treaty by China.
sentences.cn: 我们欢迎这一进展并期望中国早日批准本条约。

trans.tran_en: The ratification of a treaty or written agreement is the process of ratifying it
